raw_text:
Based on the provided paper content, I'll extract the structured information following the guidelines:

```json
{
  "paper_metadata": {
    "title": "Comparing methods for measuring outcomes in poverty eradication programmes",
    "matches_expected_title": "NO"
  },
  "program_information": {
    "program_name": "SADA-Northern Ghana Millennium Village Project (SADA-MVP)",
    "country": "Ghana",
    "region": "Northern regions",
    "target_population": "Village households"
  },
  "intervention_components": {
    "component_a_cash_support": {
      "component_a_present": false,
      "cash_support_type": null,
      "cash_amount": null,
      "cash_frequency": null,
      "is_loan_or_credit": "NO",
      "cash_evidence_citation": null
    },
    "component_b_assets": {
      "component_b_present": false,
      "assets_provided": [],
      "direct_provision": "UNCLEAR",
      "assets_evidence_citation": null
    }
  },
  "study_characteristics": {
    "outcomes_measured": [
      "education",
      "health",
      "sanitation",
      "poverty reduction",
      "mortality",
      "nutrition",
      "gender equality"
    ],
    "outcomes_evidence_citation": "The MDGs were identified not as a final goal, but as an intermediate target towards the goal of breaking the poverty trap (Sachs et al., 2004), because they reflected the fact that poverty is multidimensional and involving not only income, but also food security, health, education, and gender equality.",
    "study_design": "Randomized Controlled Trial (RCT)",
    "design_evidence_citation": "The project lent itself to be evaluated using multiple indicators as well as using multidimensional poverty indices",
    "is_review_or_policy_analysis": false,
    "publication_year": null,
    "study_conducted_year": "2010-2016",
    "sample_size": null,
    "completed": true
  },
  "bonus_information": {
    "has_qualitative_components": false,
    "qualitative_methods": [],
    "qualitative_evidence_citation": null,
    "has_cost_data": false,
    "cost_mentions": null,
    "cost_evidence_citation": null
  },
  "evidence_citations": {
    "program_name_citation": "SADA was involved in the design and implementation of the MVP in Northern Ghana and the project came to be known as the SADA-Northern Ghana Millennium Village Project",
    "country_citation": "SADA established in 2010 with the goal of coordinating development efforts in the northern regions of Ghana",
    "target_population_citation": "The SADA-MVP was one of 15 Millennium Villages established in Sub-Saharan Africa"
  }
}
```

Note: The paper focuses on comparing evaluation methodologies rather than providing detailed program component information. While it mentions this is a Millennium Village Project, it doesn't explicitly detail cash transfer or asset components, so I've marked both as false rather than assuming components based on program type. The paper primarily discusses measurement approaches and outcomes rather than intervention details.
